NF.Q: In the column Source Continents of the sankey chart, which nodes have an outflow exceeded 2706? Please list the node labels and their corresponding outflow values.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node Europe to node Cultural Festival and from node North America to node Cultural Festival, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Africa to node Shopping District, from node Africa to node Cultural Festival, and from node Africa to node Theme Park, which path has the largest flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Asia to node Shopping District, from node Asia to node Cultural Festival, and from node North America to node Cultural Festival, which path has the largest flow?
